text: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkeme, Semaia, nɨ uan nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn ghua, Masean otarim Sefanaia, a ofa gamir gumazir mam, a ko ofa gamir gumazir igharaziba bar, ko gumazamizir Jerusalemɨn itiba bar moghɨra, nɨ uan ziamɨn akɨnafarim osirigha me bagha anemada. Nɨn akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨkeme:
